actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To amend titles XIX and XXI of the Social Security Act to permit States the option of coverage of aliens who are citizens covered under the Compact of Free Association legally residing in the United States under the Medicaid Program and the State children's health insurance program (SCHIP).
short_title: Compact of Free Association Children's Health Improvement Act of 2002
subjects: Federal aid to child health services

summary.text: Compact of Free Association Children's Health Improvement Act of 2002 - Amends titles XIX (Medicaid) and XXI (State Children's Health Insurance) (SCHIP) of the Social Security Act to grant States the option of covering under the Medicaid and SCHIP programs certain categories of eligible women and child resident aliens who are citizens covered under the Compact of Free Association.

titles.title: Compact of Free Association Children's Health Improvement Act of 2002

To amend titles XIX and XXI of the Social Security Act to permit States the option of coverage of aliens who are citizens covered under the Compact of Free Association legally residing in the United States under the Medicaid Program and the State children's health insurance program (SCHIP).
